greetings_input: Did you mean to send me a message? I didn't receive any text.
Is something wrong? I got a notification that you messaged me, but there's no message here.
I'm sorry, but I don't understand what you're trying to say. Could you please clarify?
Hmm, it looks like you didn't type anything. Is everything alright?
I'm not sure what you're expecting me to say in response to a blank message.
I'm assuming this was an accidental message. No worries, it happens to the best of us!
Sorry, I'm not a mind reader. I need you to actually send me a message to know what you want to say.
I'm confused. Did you forget to type your message before sending it?
I'm not sure what you're trying to accomplish by sending me an empty message.
I'm here to help you, but I need you to tell me what you need first. Please send me a message with your question or concern.
